title: Mana Steal
body:
Mana Steal would be a great addition to the game, it is basically the opposite of Life Steal but instead of giving you Health every time you attack, it would give a percentage (%) of Mana. It could be added to new or already in game items such as Rabadon's Deathcap (Others are available). 

Please leave feedback on it and say if you agree!

***N.B. This does not have to be the actual name!***

replies.body: I'd be more interested in an AD assassin who stole mana (didn't replace his own) and then had his ultimate scale off of their missing mana.... ;D YouknowwhatImean?
Thats a crappy idea, in this %%%%ty meta they would probably give him an on demand blink and almost complete magic resist for "counterplay". gg RITO

I would be okay with that first ability on one condition: excess mana burn turns into magic damage (perhaps at 50% efficiency). That way, the ability still does something against manaless champions - they just lose 20-40 HP instead of 100 mana.

a lifesteal version of mana steal already exists....essence reaver. its for AD, thats why its not often used. it also has lifesteal on it. but less than BT for around the same price and damage, so BT is commonly picked instead.

wits end used to STEAL mana from an enemy, and it was hidden power that was REALLY strong and undervalued. so it got removed/reworked.
